HOLM05.title: The Crooked Man
HOLM05.description: Col. Barclay is found dead and his wife is arrested for the murder, but Holmes is convinced a missing door key will reveal the true killer.

LISP49.title: The Space Vikings
LISP49.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost In Space 49 - The Space Vikings.m4v
LISP49.description: Through some harmless playacting, Dr. Smith unintentionally conjures up the magical gauntlets and war hammer of the Norse god Thor. Taking him for a mighty warrior, Brynhilda spirits Smith off to Asgard for a showdown with Thor.

204651A4.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 131 Uncle Billy.m4v
204651A4.title: Leave it to Beaver - 131 Uncle Billy

CCBA90F7.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 135 Wally's Track Meet.m4v
CCBA90F7.title: Leave it to Beaver - 135 Wally's Track Meet

LISP48.title: Mutiny in Space
LISP48.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost In Space 48 - Mutiny In Space.m4v
LISP48.description: A space pirate looking for his crew that mutinied finds Will and Dr. Smith trying to repair his empty ship.

613ED467.title: Identified
613ED467.description: When an Unidentified Flying Object attacks a plane in which Straker's deputy Colonel Freeman is travelling it is shot down and investigated. The body of an alien is found and discovered to have transplanted human body parts, seemingly from a trio who disappeared in nearby woods a decade earlier.

5D6FAA57.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 133 Ward's Millions.m4v
5D6FAA57.title: Leave it to Beaver - 133 Ward's Millions

9E29D458.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 132 Teacher's Daughter.m4v
9E29D458.title: Leave it to Beaver - 132 Teacher's Daughter

709FA7AB.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 134 Beaver's Secret Life.m4v
709FA7AB.title: Leave it to Beaver - 134 Beaver's Secret Life

MWFT1937.title: Make Way for Tomorrow
MWFT1937.description: An elderly couple are forced to live hundreds of miles apart when they lose their house and none of their five children will take both parents in.

LISP51.title: The Cave of Wizards
LISP51.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost In Space 51 - The Cave Of Wizards.m4v
LISP51.description: Shortly before lift-off, Dr. Smith discovers a cave inhabited by devices, which are the remnants of a once-mighty civilization; the Draconians. As the countdown draws near, Dr. Smith falls ever-more-so under the influence of the Draconians.

LISP50.title: Rocket to Earth
LISP50.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost In Space 50 - Rocket To Earth.m4v
LISP50.description: A space wizard conjures up a spaceship so that Doctor Smith can return to Earth.
